title: Yup. AIRTEL 5G Plus.
selftext: Isn't this downright scam? The speed dropped as it does even without unlimited 5G. And they dare say sharing of data not allowed lol. Airtel is just straight up scum. Atleast JIO doesn't throw false advertising to this extent.
comments: I get 250 to 400 mbps in airtel 5g. My friend with jio gets 100 mbps.
doesn't his plan allow hotspot sharing.
Don't know. Don't care. I am concerned about myself. I get good speed in airtel 5g. Only concern is data caps which may come in future.
Same with wifi my friend have jio fiber he has some complaints every month while i have airtel xtream and i only had problems 3 times in 1.5 year
It doesn’t seem to affect me I think. I have grabbed content using unlimited 5g on my laptop with hotspot. I’ll try again and see ig

This happens with Jio 5G as well. The moment I turn my phone as a hotspot, it goes back to 4g/4g+

Didn't this was a thing. Turns out it is!
Weird. I get 500 Mbps here in Kerala.

It's not happening with me, 

Maybe try changing your phone, because my old phone was used to behave like this, in that case it was when I used turn on bluetooth.

https://preview.redd.it/cg4bqqqhf47b1.jpeg?width=1080&format=pjpg&auto=webp&v=enabled&s=3025ce33117a29b0b6e3db121f58beb93061eb90

Never had a problem with jio 5g, right now also I'm sharing data through hotspot.
wtf? Airtel fiber is not even 15 years old?
They upgraded my copper line to fiber.
